channel.name: Cleanup Channel
channel.description: This channel is run once a day and attempts to clean up any records. Cleanup is defined as any forms that have yet to be processed (processed_by_mirth = false) and are thus waiting for processing. Processing will not occur based on 3 filters: no visit found, no location found or no household found. This channel checks the submission dates of such forms, and if they are past configurable thresholds, forces them to be processed.
channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
channel.postprocessingScript: // This script executes once after a message has been processed return;
